title: Aw Lalpa mal min sawm la
lyrics:
Aw Lalpa, mal min sawm la,
Isua kraws bulah ka kun;
Ka sual hrehawm tibo la,
Damnain mi han chhang rawh.

Tunah mal min sawm la,
Aw Lalpa, mal min sawm la.

Tunah tak hian aw Lalpa,
I ropui mi entir la;
I thua awm ka ni a,
Aw Lalpa, Mal min sawm rawh.

Tunah Isua hming vangin,
Thim leh kawlte tibo la;
Ka dilna hi ngaithlain,
Ka thih hmain min sil rawh.

Tuna ka hmangaih ang hian,
Isua ka hmangaih ngai lo;
Tunah hmei hmunah hian,
Kan Pa ropui lang rawh se.
